text:
@realDonaldTrump @seanhannity - you called the coronavirus a hoax.
- you said it would disappear.
- you made fun of people wearing masks. 
- you held rallies in the midst of the pandemic. 
- you continue to say it will disappear. 
- you’re a disaster. 
- you will lose this November. 
- Biden 2020

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
